This is a testharness.js-based test.
FAIL decoding one UTF-8 chunk should give one output string promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: TextDecoderStream is not defined"
FAIL decoding an empty chunk should give no output chunks promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: TextDecoderStream is not defined"
FAIL an initial empty chunk should be ignored promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: TextDecoderStream is not defined"
FAIL a trailing empty chunk should be ignored promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: TextDecoderStream is not defined"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
